SEARCH
Package com.app.player

Interface PlayerMapper

public interface PlayerMapper
Interface for mapping Player objects to different representations.

This interface provides functions to extract the login, statistics, and ID from a Player instance.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final ToLongFunction<Player>
    toId
    Function to extract the ID from a Player.
    static final Function<Player,String>
    toLogin
    Function to extract the login from a Player.
    static final Function<Player,Map<LocalDateTime,Integer>>
    toStatistic
    Function to extract statistics from a Player.

  • Field Details

    • toLogin

      static final Function<Player,String> toLogin
      Function to extract the login from a Player.

    • toStatistic

      static final Function<Player,Map<LocalDateTime,Integer>> toStatistic
      Function to extract statistics from a Player. This function takes a Player and returns a map of statistics where the key is a LocalDateTime and the value is an Integer.

    • toId

      static final ToLongFunction<Player> toId
      Function to extract the ID from a Player. This function takes a Player and returns its ID as a long.
